<u>Question 4</u>
```
queue <- c("sheep", "fox", "owl", "ant")

```

a)
```
queue <- c(queue, "serpent")
print(queue)
```

b)
```
queue <- queue[-1]
print(queue)
```

c)
```
queue <- c("donkey", queue)
print(queue)
```

d)
```
queue <- queue[-5]
print(queue)
```

e)
```
queue <- queue[-3]
print(queue)
```

f)
```
queue <- c(queue[1:2], "aphid", queue[3])
print(queue)
```
g)
```
print(length(queue[-1]))
```
